casebody.data:
Gary Lintz v. Susan Lintz (12424)

Dupont, C. J., O’Connell and Foti, Js.

Argued March 28 decision released April 19, 1994 Gary Lintz, pro se, the appellant (plaintiff). Shirley M. Pripstein, for the appellee (defendant). Rochelle Homelson, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, were Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Seymour P. Dunn, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
